services.description: Automatically distributes incoming application traffic across multiple targets, such as Amazon EC2 instances, containers, and IP addresses, in one or more Availability Zones. It increases the availability and fault tolerance of your applications.

Allows you to centrally manage and govern your environment as you grow and scale your AWS resources. It provides account management, consolidated billing, and the ability to apply policies across multiple accounts.

Monitors your applications and automatically adjusts capacity to maintain steady, predictable performance at the lowest possible cost. It supports scaling for multiple services, including EC2, ECS, and DynamoDB.

Enables governance, compliance, operational auditing, and risk auditing of your AWS account. It logs, continuously monitors, and retains account activity related to actions across your AWS infrastructure.

A managed service that makes it easy for you to create and control the cryptographic keys used to encrypt your data. It is integrated with many other AWS services to protect data at rest and in transit.

Helps you protect access to your applications, services, and IT resources by rotating, managing, and retrieving database credentials, API keys, and other secrets throughout their lifecycle. It offers automatic secret rotation.

A serverless orchestration service that lets you easily coordinate multiple AWS services into business-critical workflows (state machines). It enables you to build and update applications quickly by managing the logic and implementing branching, parallel execution, and timeouts.

A fully managed service that makes it easy to develop scalable, secure, and performant serverless applications by hosting managed GraphQL APIs. It automatically handles connecting to data sources like DynamoDB, Lambda, and RDS.

An interactive query service that makes it easy to analyze data directly in Amazon S3 using standard SQL. It's serverless, so there's no infrastructure to manage, and you pay only for the queries you run.

A serverless data integration service that makes it easy to discover, prepare, and combine data for analytics, machine learning, and application development. It includes a Data Catalog, ETL jobs, and crawlers.
A fully managed, petabyte-scale cloud data warehouse service. It offers high-performance querying and is designed for complex analytic workloads on large datasets.

A cloud-native, serverless business intelligence (BI) service that can easily create and publish interactive BI dashboards. It features machine learning-powered insights and is accessible from any device.

A fully managed, in-memory data store service compatible with Redis and Memcached. It helps to deploy, operate, and scale a popular open-source compatible in-memory data store or cache in the cloud for sub-millisecond latency.

A real-time data streaming service that is able to continuously capture and store gigabytes of data per second from hundreds of thousands of sources. It's designed for real-time applications like monitoring and anomaly detection.

A serverless service that reliably loads streaming data into data lakes, data stores, and analytics services. It automatically converts data to formats like Parquet and ORC and can apply Lambda-based transformations.

Helps developers analyze and debug production and distributed applications, such as those built using microservices architecture. It provides an end-to-end view of requests as they travel through your application, showing a service map and segment details.
A set of tools and services that enables mobile and front-end web developers to build secure, scalable full-stack applications powered by AWS. It includes a framework, a CLI, and a hosting service.
A fully managed continuous integration service that compiles source code, runs tests, and produces deployable software packages. It scales continuously and processes multiple builds concurrently.

A fully managed deployment service that automates software deployments to a variety of compute services, including Amazon EC2, AWS Lambda, and on-premises servers. It supports in-place and blue/green deployment types.

A fully managed continuous delivery service that helps automate your release pipelines for fast and reliable application and infrastructure updates. It orchestrates the entire release process from source commit to deployment.

A serverless compute engine for containers that works with both Amazon ECS and Amazon EKS. It removes the need to provision, configure, and scale clusters of virtual machines, letting you focus on designing your application.

Provides persistent block storage volumes for use with Amazon EC2 instances in the AWS Cloud. Each volume is automatically replicated within its Availability Zone to protect you from component failure.
A fully managed machine learning service that helps data scientists and developers prepare, build, train, and deploy high-quality machine learning models quickly. It covers the entire ML lifecycle.
A data labeling service that helps you build high-quality training datasets for your machine learning models. It can use human annotators (workers) and machine learning to label data efficiently.

A MySQL and PostgreSQL-compatible relational database built for the cloud, combining the performance and availability of traditional enterprise databases with the simplicity and cost-effectiveness of open-source databases.

Provides fully managed third-party file systems optimized for different workloads. Offers FSx for Windows File Server, FSx for Lustre, FSx for NetApp ONTAP, and FSx for OpenZFS with enterprise features and performance.

Provides private connectivity between VPCs, AWS services, and on-premises applications without exposing traffic to the public internet. Simplifies network architecture and enhances security by keeping traffic within the AWS network.

Provides an easy way to set up and govern a secure, multi-account AWS environment based on best practices. Automates the setup of a baseline environment with pre-configured controls and guardrails for governance.

A fast, reliable, fully managed graph database service optimized for storing billions of relationships and querying the graph with milliseconds latency. Supports both property graph and RDF graph models with Apache TinkerPop Gremlin and SPARQL query languages.

A managed service that makes it easy to deploy, operate, and scale OpenSearch clusters for log analytics, full-text search, application monitoring, and more. Successor to Amazon Elasticsearch Service with enhanced features.

Enables customers to create isolated compute environments to protect and securely process highly sensitive data within EC2 instances. Uses the AWS Nitro System to provide CPU and memory isolation with cryptographic attestation.

Brings native AWS services, infrastructure, and operating models to virtually any data center, co-location space, or on-premises facility. Enables a truly consistent hybrid experience with the same AWS APIs, tools, and infrastructure on-premises and in the cloud.

Makes it easy to set up a secure data lake in days. Automates the complex manual steps required to create data lakes including collecting, cleansing, cataloging, and securing data, and making it available for analytics and machine learning.

A cloud big data platform for running large-scale distributed data processing jobs using open-source frameworks such as Apache Spark, Hadoop, Hive, and Presto. Simplifies running big data frameworks to process and analyze vast amounts of data.

A fully managed integration service that enables you to securely transfer data between Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) applications and AWS services. Automates bi-directional data flows without writing code.

Enables you to visualize, understand, and manage your AWS costs and usage over time. Provides detailed reports with filtering and grouping capabilities, forecasting, and recommendations for cost optimization.

Allows you to set custom budgets to track your costs and usage, and respond quickly to alerts received from email or SNS notifications if you exceed your threshold. Supports cost, usage, reservation, and Savings Plans budgets.

A cost-effective, flexible, and scalable email service that enables developers to send mail from within any application. Supports transactional emails, marketing messages, and bulk email communications with high deliverability.

A fully managed ledger database that provides a transparent, immutable, and cryptographically verifiable transaction log. Tracks every application data change and maintains a complete and verifiable history of changes over time.

Enables developers, scientists, and engineers to easily and efficiently run hundreds of thousands of batch computing jobs. Dynamically provisions the optimal quantity and type of compute resources based on volume and resource requirements.

An easy-to-use cloud platform that offers everything needed to build an application or website, plus a cost-effective monthly plan. Provides virtual servers, storage, databases, and networking with a simple management console.

A fully managed container registry that makes it easy to store, manage, share, and deploy container images and artifacts. Integrates with Amazon ECS and EKS to simplify development to production workflow with secure, scalable, and reliable infrastructure.

Helps you migrate databases to AWS quickly and securely. The source database remains fully operational during the migration, minimizing downtime. Supports homogeneous and heterogeneous migrations between different database platforms.

A fully managed artifact repository service that makes it easy to securely store, publish, and share software packages used in software development. Works with popular package managers like npm, pip, Maven, and NuGet.

A browser-based shell that makes it easy to securely manage, explore, and interact with your AWS resources. Comes pre-authenticated with your console credentials and includes common tools and the AWS CLI pre-installed.

Provides a unified user interface to quickly develop, build, and deploy applications on AWS. Creates and integrates AWS services for your development toolchain, enabling you to start coding, building, and deploying in minutes.

A developer tool powered by machine learning that provides intelligent recommendations to improve code quality and identify an application's most expensive lines of code. Includes CodeGuru Reviewer for automated code reviews and CodeGuru Profiler for application performance optimization.

A fast, scalable, highly available, and fully managed document database service that supports MongoDB workloads. Makes it easy to store, query, and index JSON data with MongoDB compatibility and the performance, scalability, and availability of AWS.

A natural language processing (NLP) service that uses machine learning to find insights and relationships in text. Identifies the language, extracts key phrases, places, people, brands, events, sentiment, and more from unstructured text.

A data security service that uses machine learning and pattern matching to discover and protect your sensitive data in AWS. Automatically provides an inventory of S3 buckets and evaluates them for security and access control.

An intelligent enterprise search service powered by machine learning. Allows users to search across different content repositories with built-in connectors, delivering more accurate results through natural language understanding and deep learning models.

Makes it easy to build workflows for human review of machine learning predictions. Provides built-in human review workflows for common use cases like content moderation and text extraction, or create your own custom workflows for any ML application.

A service for building conversational interfaces using voice and text. Provides advanced deep learning functionalities of automatic speech recognition (ASR) and natural language understanding (NLU) to enable creation of sophisticated chatbots.

Enables developers to build applications with real-time personalized recommendations using the same machine learning technology used by Amazon.com. Requires no ML expertise to create custom recommendation models based on your data.

Turns text into lifelike speech using deep learning. Enables you to create applications that talk and build entirely new categories of speech-enabled products. Supports multiple languages and includes a variety of natural-sounding voices.

Makes it easy to add image and video analysis to your applications using deep learning technology. Identifies objects, people, text, scenes, and activities in images and videos, as well as detecting inappropriate content and providing facial analysis and recognition.

Automatically extracts text, handwriting, and data from scanned documents using machine learning. Goes beyond simple optical character recognition (OCR) to identify, understand, and extract data from forms and tables without manual configuration.

Automatically converts speech to text using advanced deep learning technologies. Provides features like speaker identification, custom vocabularies, automatic content redaction, and multi-language support for analyzing audio files and real-time streams.

A neural machine translation service that delivers fast, high-quality, affordable, and customizable language translation. Supports translation between dozens of languages and provides automatic language detection for efficient text localization.

Helps you create, manage, and quickly deploy application configurations. Enables controlled deployments to applications of any size with built-in validation checks and monitoring to catch errors before they affect users.

Provides real-time guidance to help you provision your resources following AWS best practices. Inspects your AWS environment and makes recommendations for cost optimization, performance, security, fault tolerance, and service limits.

Provides a unified user interface to view operational data from multiple AWS services and automate operational tasks across AWS resources. Helps you maintain security and compliance by scanning instances and reporting on policy violations.

Makes it easy to establish a dedicated network connection from your premises to AWS. Reduces network costs, increases bandwidth throughput, and provides a more consistent network experience than internet-based connections.

A networking service that improves the availability and performance of applications with global users. Uses the AWS global network to optimize the path from users to applications, improving performance by up to 60% through intelligent routing.

Connects VPCs and on-premises networks through a central hub. Simplifies network architecture and eliminates complex peering relationships, acting as a cloud router where each new connection is made only once.

Handles the complexity of creating, storing, and renewing public and private SSL/TLS X.509 certificates and keys that protect AWS websites and applications. Provides free public certificates for AWS services and manages certificate renewals automatically.

Provides hardware security modules in the AWS Cloud. Enables you to generate and use your own encryption keys on dedicated FIPS 140-2 Level 3 validated hardware, meeting corporate, contractual, and regulatory compliance requirements for data security.

A security management service that allows you to centrally configure and manage firewall rules across your accounts and applications in AWS Organizations. Simplifies administration and maintenance tasks across multiple accounts and resources.

A threat detection service that continuously monitors for malicious activity and unauthorized behavior to protect your AWS accounts, workloads, and data. Uses machine learning, anomaly detection, and integrated threat intelligence to identify and prioritize potential threats.

A managed Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) protection service that safeguards applications running on AWS. Shield Standard provides automatic protection at no additional charge, while Shield Advanced offers enhanced protections and 24/7 access to the AWS DDoS Response Team.

An automated security assessment service that helps improve the security and compliance of applications deployed on AWS. Automatically assesses applications for vulnerabilities, deviations from best practices, and generates detailed findings prioritized by severity.

Provides a simple, serverless, elastic file system that automatically grows and shrinks as you add and remove files. Designed to provide massively parallel shared access to thousands of Amazon EC2 instances and on-premises servers simultaneously.

Provides fully managed shared storage built on NetApp's popular ONTAP file system. Combines the familiar features, performance, and APIs of on-premises NetApp file systems with the agility, scalability, and simplicity of a fully managed AWS service.

Provides a high-performance file system optimized for fast processing of workloads such as machine learning, high performance computing, video processing, and financial modeling. Integrates seamlessly with Amazon S3 for data repositories.

Provides fully managed shared file storage built on the OpenZFS file system. Delivers up to 1 million IOPS with latencies of hundreds of microseconds, making it ideal for latency-sensitive workloads like databases, DevOps, and media processing.

services.service_name: Amazon FSx for Windows File Server (WFS)
services.description: Provides fully managed Microsoft Windows file servers, backed by a fully native Windows file system. Built on Windows Server and offers shared file storage with the compatibility and features customers expect from Windows-based environments.

A petabyte-scale data transport solution that uses secure devices to transfer large amounts of data into and out of AWS. Addresses challenges with large-scale data transfers including high network costs, long transfer times, and security concerns.

A hybrid cloud storage service that provides on-premises access to virtually unlimited cloud storage. Connects an on-premises software appliance with cloud-based storage to provide seamless integration with data security features between your environment and AWS.

A cloud-based integrated development environment (IDE) that lets you write, run, and debug code with just a browser. Includes a code editor, debugger, and terminal with pre-packaged essential tools for popular programming languages and direct terminal access to AWS.

A web application firewall that helps protect your web applications or APIs against common web exploits and bots that may affect availability, compromise security, or consume excessive resources. Lets you create custom rules to block common attack patterns like SQL injection or cross-site scripting.
